item.title: VMware vSAN 6.6 - What's New for Day 2 Operations?
item.description: VMware has just announced vSAN v6.6, with over 20 new features. While new and shiny features are niceÂ I’d like to highlight a couple that I think might be undervalued from release feature-set perspective, but highly valuable in day to day operations of a vSAN environment, otherwise known as Day 2 operations.
